name: beapi.js
description: Manage BEdita API calls on your javascript client

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && babel --modules ignore --out-file dist/beapi.js < src/model.next.js src/model.next.js src/collection.next.js src/object.next.js src/xhr.next.js src/beapi.next.js src/beapi.queue.next.js src/methods/* --source-maps
scripts.release: npm run tests && npm run build && node release.js
